channel.title: CVE Feed for Micro Focus -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Micro Focus -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-7683|2024-08-05T06:31:05.247Z -- micro%20focus -- solutions%20business%20manager%2011.4
item.description: Micro Focus Solutions Business Manager versions prior to 11.4 might reveal certain sensitive information in server log files.

item.title: CVE-2019-18945|2024-08-05T02:02:39.887Z -- micro%20focus -- solutions%20business%20manager
item.description: Micro Focus Solutions Business Manager Application Repository versions prior to 11.7.1 are vulnerable to privilege escalation vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2018-6502|2024-08-05T06:10:09.994Z -- micro%20focus -- arcsight%20management%20center
item.description: A potential Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) Security vulnerability has been identified in ArcSight Management Center (ArcMC) in all versions prior to 2.81. This vulnerability could be exploited to allow for Reflected Cross-site Scripting (XSS).

item.title: CVE-2018-6493|2024-08-05T06:01:49.273Z -- micro%20focus -- network%20operations%20management%20ultimate
item.description: SQL Injection in HP Network Operations Management Ultimate, version 2017.07, 2017.11, 2018.02 and in Network Automation, version 10.00, 10.10, 10.11, 10.20, 10.30, 10.40, 10.50. This vulnerability could be remotely exploited to allow Remote SQL Injection.

item.title: CVE-2018-12465|2024-08-05T08:38:06.165Z -- micro%20focus -- secure%20messaging%20gateway
item.description: An OS command injection vulnerability in the web administration component of Micro Focus Secure Messaging Gateway (SMG) allows a remote attacker authenticated as a privileged user to execute arbitrary OS commands on the SMG server. This can be exploited in conjunction with CVE-2018-12464 to achieve unauthenticated remote code execution. Affects Micro Focus Secure Messaging Gateway versions prior to 471. It does not affect previous versions of the product that used GWAVA product name (i.e. GWAVA 6.5).

item.title: CVE-2018-7682|2024-08-05T06:31:05.093Z -- micro%20focus -- solutions%20business%20manager%2011.4
item.description: Micro Focus Solutions Business Manager versions prior to 11.4 allows a user to invoke SBM RESTful services across domains.

item.title: CVE-2018-7679|2024-08-05T06:31:05.043Z -- micro%20focus -- solutions%20business%20manager%2011.4
item.description: Micro Focus Solutions Business Manager versions prior to 11.4 when ASP.NET is configured with execute permission on the virtual directories and does not validate the contents of user avatar images, could lead to remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2018-6491|2024-08-05T06:01:49.261Z -- micro%20focus -- universal%20cmdb
item.description: Local Escalation of Privilege vulnerability to Micro Focus Universal CMDB, versions 10.20, 10.21, 10.22, 10.30, 10.31, 10.32, 10.33, 11.00. The vulnerability could be remotely exploited to Local Escalation of Privilege.

item.title: CVE-2018-12469|2024-08-05T08:38:05.945Z -- micro%20focus -- micro%20focus%20enterprise%20developer%2C%20micro%20focus%20enterprise%20server
item.description: Incorrect handling of an invalid value for an HTTP request parameter by Directory Server (aka Enterprise Server Administration web UI) in Micro Focus Enterprise Developer and Enterprise Server 2.3 Update 2 and earlier, 3.0 before Patch Update 12, and 4.0 before Patch Update 2 causes a null pointer dereference (CWE-476) and subsequent denial of service due to process termination.

item.title: CVE-2018-7686|2024-08-05T06:31:05.261Z -- micro%20focus -- edirectory%20%28zdi%29
item.description: Information leakage vulnerability in NetIQ eDirectory before 9.1.1 HF1 due to shared memory usage.

item.title: CVE-2018-18589|2024-08-05T11:15:59.896Z -- micro%20focus -- microfocus%20real%20user%20monitoring
item.description: A potential Remote Arbitrary Code Execution vulnerability has been identified in Micro Focus' Real User Monitoring software, versions 9.26IP, 9.30, 9.40 and 9.50. The vulnerability could be exploited to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2018-19641|2024-08-05T11:44:20.199Z -- micro%20focus -- solutions%20business%20manager%20%28sbm%29
item.description: Unauthenticated remote code execution issue in Micro Focus Solutions Business Manager (SBM) (formerly Serena Business Manager (SBM)) versions prior to 11.5.

item.title: CVE-2018-17952|2024-08-05T11:01:14.599Z -- micro%20focus -- netiq%20edirectory%209.1%20sp2
item.description: Cross site scripting vulnerability in eDirectory prior to 9.1 SP2

item.title: CVE-2018-18590|2024-08-05T11:15:59.895Z -- micro%20focus -- operation%20bridge%20containerized%20suite
item.description: A potential remote code execution and information disclosure vulnerability exists in Micro Focus Operations Bridge containerized suite versions 2017.11, 2018.02, 2018.05, 2018.08. This vulnerability could allow for information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2018-12463|2024-08-05T08:38:05.751Z -- micro%20focus -- fortify%20software%20security%20center
item.description: An XML external entity (XXE) vulnerability in Fortify Software Security Center (SSC), version 17.1, 17.2, 18.1 allows remote unauthenticated users to read arbitrary files or conduct server-side request forgery (SSRF) attacks via a crafted DTD in an XML request.

item.title: CVE-2019-18943|2024-08-05T02:02:39.862Z -- micro%20focus -- solutions%20business%20manager
item.description: Micro Focus Solutions Business Manager versions prior to 11.7.1 are vulnerable to XML External Entity Processing (XXE) on certain operations.

item.title: CVE-2018-6487|2024-08-05T06:01:49.289Z -- micro%20focus -- universal%20cmdb%20foundation%20software
item.description: Remote Disclosure of Information in Micro Focus Universal CMDB Foundation Software, version numbers 10.10, 10.11, 10.20, 10.21, 10.22, 10.30, 10.31, 4.10, 4.11. This vulnerability could be remotely exploited to allow disclosure of information.

item.title: CVE-2018-12464|2024-08-05T08:38:05.924Z -- micro%20focus -- secure%20messaging%20gateway
item.description: A SQL injection vulnerability in the web administration and quarantine components of Micro Focus Secure Messaging Gateway allows an unauthenticated remote attacker to execute arbitrary SQL statements against the database. This can be exploited to create an administrative account and used in conjunction with CVE-2018-12465 to achieve unauthenticated remote code execution. Affects Micro Focus Secure Messaging Gateway versions prior to 471. It does not affect previous versions of the product that use the GWAVA product name (i.e. GWAVA 6.5).

item.title: CVE-2018-6494|2024-08-05T06:01:49.272Z -- micro%20focus -- hp%20service%20manager%20software
item.description: Remote SQL Injection against the HP Service Manager Software Web Tier, version 9.30, 9.31, 9.32, 9.33, 9.34, 9.35, 9.40, 9.41, 9.50, 9.51, may lead to unauthorized disclosure of data.

item.title: CVE-2018-1343|2024-08-05T03:59:39.036Z -- micro%20focus -- netiq%20privileged%20account%20manager%20%28pam%29%203.1%20and%203.2
item.description: PAM exposure enabling unauthenticated access to remote host

item.title: CVE-2018-6505|2024-08-05T06:10:10.265Z -- micro%20focus -- arcsight%20management%20center
item.description: A potential Unauthenticated File Download vulnerability has been identified in ArcSight Management Center (ArcMC) in all versions prior to 2.81. This vulnerability could be exploited to allow for Unauthenticated File Downloads.

item.title: CVE-2018-17949|2024-08-05T11:01:14.661Z -- micro%20focus -- netiq%20imanager%203.1%20sp2
item.description: Cross site scripting vulnerability in iManager prior to 3.1 SP2.

item.title: CVE-2018-7692|2024-08-05T06:31:05.138Z -- micro%20focus -- netiq%20edirectory%20versions%20prior%20to%209.1.1%20hf1
item.description: Unvalidated redirect vulnerability in in NetIQ eDirectory before 9.1.1 HF1.

item.title: CVE-2018-19642|2024-08-05T11:44:20.177Z -- micro%20focus -- solutions%20business%20manager%20%28sbm%29
item.description: Denial of service issue in Micro Focus Solutions Business Manager (SBM) (formerly Serena Business Manager (SBM)) versions prior to 11.5.

item.title: CVE-2018-6499|2024-08-05T06:01:49.170Z -- micro%20focus -- network%20operations%20management%20%28nom%29%20suite%20cdf
item.description: Remote Code Execution in the following products Hybrid Cloud Management Containerized Suite HCM2017.11, HCM2018.02, HCM2018.05, Operations Bridge Containerized Suite 2017.11, 2018.02, 2018.05, Data Center Automation Containerized Suite 2017.01 until 2018.05, Service Management Automation Suite 2017.11, 2018.02, 2018.05, Service Virtualization (SV) with floating licenses using Any version using APLS older than 10.7, Unified Functional Testing (UFT) with floating licenses using Any version using APLS older than 10.7, Network Virtualization (NV) with floating licenses using Any version using APLS older than 10.7 and Network Operations Management (NOM) Suite CDF 2017.11, 2018.02, 2018.05 will allow Remote Code Execution.

item.title: CVE-2018-6504|2024-08-05T06:10:10.229Z -- micro%20focus -- arcsight%20management%20center
item.description: A potential Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability has been identified in ArcSight Management Center (ArcMC) in all versions prior to 2.81. This vulnerability could be exploited to allow for Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF).

item.title: CVE-2018-18593|2024-08-05T11:15:59.681Z -- micro%20focus -- ucmdb%20configuration%20management%20service
item.description: Remote Directory Traversal and Remote Disclosure of Privileged Information in UCMDB Configuration Management Service, version 10.22, 10.22 CUP1, 10.22 CUP2, 10.22 CUP3, 10.22 CUP4, 10.22 CUP5, 10.22 CUP6, 10.22 CUP7, 10.33, 10.33 CUP1, 10.33 CUP2, 10.33 CUP3, 2018.02, 2018.05, 2018.08, 2018.11. The vulnerabilities could allow Remote Directory Traversal and Remote Disclosure of Privileged Information

item.title: CVE-2018-6496|2024-08-05T06:01:49.082Z -- micro%20focus -- ucmdb%20browser
item.description: Remote Cross-site Request forgery (CSRF) potential has been identified in UCMBD Browser version 4.10, 4.11, 4.12, 4.13, 4.14, 4.15, 4.15.1 which could allow for remote unsafe deserialization and cross-site request forgery (CSRF).

item.title: CVE-2018-7687|2024-08-05T06:31:05.169Z -- micro%20focus -- client%20for%20open%20enterprise%20server
item.description: The Micro Focus Client for OES before version 2 SP4 IR8a has a vulnerability that could allow a local attacker to elevate privileges via a buffer overflow in ncfsd.sys.

item.title: CVE-2018-19643|2024-08-05T11:44:19.620Z -- micro%20focus -- solutions%20business%20manager%20%28sbm%29
item.description: Information leakage issue in Micro Focus Solutions Business Manager (SBM) (formerly Serena Business Manager (SBM)) versions prior to 11.5.

item.title: CVE-2018-6500|2024-08-05T06:01:49.348Z -- micro%20focus -- arcsight%20management%20center
item.description: A potential Directory Traversal Security vulnerability has been identified in ArcSight Management Center (ArcMC) in all versions prior to 2.81. This vulnerability could be remotely exploited to allow Directory Traversal.

item.title: CVE-2018-6503|2024-08-05T06:10:10.037Z -- micro%20focus -- arcsight%20management%20center
item.description: A potential Access Control vulnerability has been identified in ArcSight Management Center (ArcMC) in all versions prior to 2.81. This vulnerability could be exploited to allow for vulnerable Access Controls.

item.title: CVE-2018-6486|2024-08-05T06:01:49.279Z -- micro%20focus -- fortify%20audit%20workbench%20%28awb%29%20and%20micro%20focus%20fortify%20software%20security%20center%20%28ssc%29
item.description: XML External Entity (XXE) vulnerability in Micro Focus Fortify Audit Workbench (AWB) and Micro Focus Fortify Software Security Center (SSC), versions 16.10, 16.20, 17.10. This vulnerability could be exploited to allow a XML External Entity (XXE) injection.

item.title: CVE-2018-17950|2024-08-05T11:01:14.733Z -- micro%20focus -- netiq%20edirectory%209.1%20sp2
item.description: Incorrect enforcement of authorization checks in eDirectory prior to 9.1 SP2

item.title: CVE-2019-18947|2024-08-05T02:02:39.962Z -- micro%20focus -- solutions%20business%20manager
item.description: Micro Focus Solutions Business Manager Application Repository versions prior to 11.7.1 are vulnerable to information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2018-7681|2024-08-05T06:31:05.066Z -- micro%20focus -- solutions%20business%20manager%2011.4
item.description: Micro Focus Solutions Business Manager versions prior to 11.4 allows JavaScript to be embedded in URLs placed in "Favorites" folder. If the user has certain administrative privileges then this vulnerability can impact other users in the system.

item.title: CVE-2018-6497|2024-08-05T06:01:49.273Z -- micro%20focus -- universal%20cmdb%20server
item.description: Remote Cross-site Request forgery (CSRF) potential has been identified in UCMBD Server version DDM Content Pack V 10.20, 10.21, 10.22, 10.22 CUP7, 10.30, 10.31, 10.32, 10.33, 10.33 CUP2, 11.0 and CMS Server version 2018.05 BACKGROUND which could allow for remote unsafe deserialization and cross-site request forgery (CSRF).

item.title: CVE-2018-6495|2024-08-05T06:01:49.255Z -- micro%20focus -- ucmdb
item.description: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in Micro Focus Universal CMDB, version 10.20, 10.21, 10.22, 10.30, 10.31, 10.32, 10.33, 11.0, CMS, version 4.10, 4.11, 4.12, 4.13, 4.14, 4.15.1 and Micro Focus UCMDB Browser, version 4.10, 4.11, 4.12, 4.13, 4.14, 4.15.1. This vulnerability could be remotely exploited to allow Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).

item.title: CVE-2018-7690|2024-08-05T06:31:05.131Z -- micro%20focus -- fortify%20software%20security%20center%20%28ssc%29
item.description: A potential Remote Unauthorized Access in Micro Focus Fortify Software Security Center (SSC), versions 17.10, 17.20, 18.10 this exploitation could allow Remote Unauthorized Access

item.title: CVE-2018-7691|2024-08-05T06:31:05.130Z -- micro%20focus -- fortify%20software%20security%20center%20%28ssc%29
item.description: A potential Remote Unauthorized Access in Micro Focus Fortify Software Security Center (SSC), versions 17.10, 17.20, 18.10 this exploitation could allow Remote Unauthorized Access

item.title: CVE-2018-18591|2024-08-05T11:16:00.042Z -- micro%20focus -- micro%20focus%20service%20manager
item.description: A potential unauthorized disclosure of data vulnerability has been identified in Micro Focus Service Manager versions: 9.30, 9.31, 9.32, 9.33, 9.34, 9.35, 9.40, 9.41, 9.50, 9.51. The vulnerability could be exploited to release unauthorized disclosure of data.

item.title: CVE-2019-18944|2024-08-05T02:02:40.123Z -- micro%20focus -- solutions%20business%20manager
item.description: Micro Focus Solutions Business Manager Application Repository versions prior to 11.7.1 are vulnerable to reflected XSS.

item.title: CVE-2018-6492|2024-08-05T06:01:49.281Z -- micro%20focus -- network%20operations%20management%20ultimate
item.description: Persistent Cross-Site Scripting, and non-persistent HTML Injection in HP Network Operations Management Ultimate, version 2017.07, 2017.11, 2018.02 and in Network Automation, version 10.00, 10.10, 10.11, 10.20, 10.30, 10.40, 10.50. This vulnerability could be remotely exploited to allow persistent cross-site scripting, and non-persistent HTML Injection.

item.title: CVE-2018-6488|2024-08-05T06:01:49.274Z -- micro%20focus -- micro%20focus%20universal%20cmdb
item.description: Arbitrary Code Execution vulnerability in Micro Focus Universal CMDB, version 4.10, 4.11, 4.12. This vulnerability could be remotely exploited to allow Arbitrary Code Execution.

item.title: CVE-2018-19644|2024-08-05T11:44:19.589Z -- micro%20focus -- solutions%20business%20manager%20%28sbm%29
item.description: Reflected cross site script issue in Micro Focus Solutions Business Manager (SBM) (formerly Serena Business Manager (SBM)) versions prior to 11.5.

item.title: CVE-2017-5187|2024-08-05T14:55:35.343Z -- micro%20focus -- micro%20focus%20enterprise%20developer%2C%20micro%20focus%20enterprise%20server
item.description: A Cross-Site Request Forgery (CWE-352) vulnerability in Directory Server (aka Enterprise Server Administration web UI) in Micro Focus Enterprise Developer and Enterprise Server 2.3 and earlier, 2.3 Update 1 before Hotfix 8, and 2.3 Update 2 before Hotfix 9 allows remote unauthenticated attackers to view and alter (CWE-275) configuration information and inject OS commands (CWE-78) via forged requests.

item.title: CVE-2018-1342|2024-08-05T03:59:38.608Z -- micro%20focus -- netiq%20access%20manager%2C%20administrative%20console
item.description: A Vulnerability exists on Admin Console where an attacker can upload files to the Admin Console server, and potentially execute them. This impacts NetIQ Access Manager versions 4.3 and 4.4 as well as the Administrative console.

item.title: CVE-2018-12468|2024-08-05T08:38:06.091Z -- micro%20focus -- groupwise
item.description: A vulnerability in the administration console of Micro Focus GroupWise prior to version 18.0.2 may allow a remote attacker authenticated as an administrator to upload files to an arbitrary path on the server. In certain circumstances this could result in remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2019-18946|2024-08-05T02:02:39.860Z -- micro%20focus -- solutions%20business%20manager
item.description: Micro Focus Solutions Business Manager Application Repository versions prior to 11.7.1 are vulnerable to session fixation.

item.title: CVE-2019-18942|2024-08-05T02:02:39.850Z -- micro%20focus -- solutions%20business%20manager
item.description: Micro Focus Solutions Business Manager versions prior to 11.7.1 are vulnerable to stored XSS. The application reflects previously stored user input without encoding.

item.title: CVE-2018-6490|2024-08-05T06:01:49.173Z -- micro%20focus -- operations%20orchestration%20software
item.description: Denial of Service vulnerability in Micro Focus Operations Orchestration Software, version 10.x. This vulnerability could be remotely exploited to allow Denial of Service.

item.title: CVE-2018-6498|2024-08-05T06:01:49.095Z -- micro%20focus -- network%20operations%20management%20%28nom%29%20suite%20cdf
item.description: Remote Code Execution in the following products Hybrid Cloud Management Containerized Suite HCM2017.11, HCM2018.02, HCM2018.05, Operations Bridge Containerized Suite 2017.11, 2018.02, 2018.05, Data Center Automation Containerized Suite 2017.01 until 2018.05, Service Management Automation Suite 2017.11, 2018.02, 2018.05 and Network Operations Management (NOM) Suite CDF 2017.11, 2018.02, 2018.05 will allow Remote Code Execution.

item.title: CVE-2018-7680|2024-08-05T06:31:04.980Z -- micro%20focus -- solutions%20business%20manager%2011.4
item.description: Micro Focus Solutions Business Manager versions prior to 11.4 can reflect back HTTP header values.
